name: Perkier Naturally
description: Beautiful, artisanal, botanical soaps created in small batches, using quality ingredients from sustainable sources. No minimum spend, no delivery charges. Packaged in slim, letterbox-friendly boxes (recycled and recyclable). Check www.perkiernaturally.co.uk to see what you'd like to order (ignore 'out of stock'), then email us to arrange payment and delivery.
safetyTips: All orders are packed with care, taking the appropriate safety and hygiene precautions. Delivery is by bicycle as part of my hours exercise for the day. All boxes are letterbox friendly, meaning no contact is required during delivery.
